column5: my dad claims that bullheads taste good. i know a spot thats freakin packed with bullheads right now so i may try them any body have some cooking recipies?!!?!?!

They are good, put on some butter, salt and pepper...and leave some dirt on...really...we need to eat more dirt...I'm serious.  I ate dirt as a kid...have never had a serious illness like the measles, mumps, etc etc...a Native Medicine Woman confirmed that to me years later...Natives know the richness that comes from the land...so go eat dirt everybody.
1: Clean and skin. 2: Dip in milk. 3: Roll in cornmeal. 4: Fry in hot lard.  Enjoy
They're very good to eat IF they come from clean water.  When you go fishin' for them don't forget to take the camera, I'd like to see a good Bullhead report!
Be sure to wash your dirt before eating it.... > > > > >... it might be dirty!
they also make excellant bait around here for shovelhead cat and blue cat have caught fish in the forty pound range on them
One of my favorites. Better than perch IMO
MMMMMM   fiddleheads, steamed  then in cider vinegar!!!!!!
When I was a kid we called them Mudpout and ate them by the pailfull.
HAHAAH!  is that a southern thing?  Cajun style?  LOL  HD
